content: The **Third Goh Chok Tong Cabinet** is the [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore) formed by [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore) [Goh Chok Tong](/wiki/Goh_Chok_Tong) following the [1997 general election](/wiki/1997_Singaporean_general_election) which governed the country until prior to the [2001 general election](/wiki/2001_Singaporean_general_election). ## Cabinet The Third Goh Chok Tong Cabinet is composed of the following members.
